org.fujion.plotly.layout

Class UpdateMenuOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fujion.ancillary.Options
      • org.fujion.plotly.layout.UpdateMenuOptions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OptionMap.IOptionMapConverter, IClientTransform

    public class UpdateMenuOptions
extends Options
    Layout options for update menus.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  UpdateMenuOptions.DirectionEnum
      Determines how buttons are laid out.
      static class  UpdateMenuOptions.TypeEnum
      Type of update menu.

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Integer active
      Determines which button (by index starting from 0) is considered active.
      String bgcolor
      The background color of the update menu buttons.

      The color of the border enclosing the update menu.

      The width (in px) of the border enclosing the update menu.

      Menu button options.

      Determines the direction in which the buttons are laid out, whether in a dropdown menu or a row/column of buttons.

      The font of the update menu button text.

      The amount of padding (in px) along the bottom of the component.

      The amount of padding (in px) along the left of the component.

      The amount of padding (in px) along the right of the component.

      The amount of padding (in px) along the top of the component.
      Boolean showactive
      Highlights active dropdown item or active button if true.
      UpdateMenuOptions.TypeEnum type
      Determines whether the buttons are accessible via a dropdown menu or whether the buttons are stacked horizontally or vertically.

      Determines whether or not the update menu is visible.

      The x position (in normalized coordinates) of the update menu.
      HorizontalAlignEnum xanchor
      The update menu's horizontal position anchor.
      Double y
      The y position (in normalized coordinates) of the update menu.
      VerticalAlignEnum yanchor
      The update menu's vertical position anchor This anchor binds the "y" position to the top, middle or bottom of the range selector.

    • Field Detail

      • active

        @Option
public Integer active
        Determines which button (by index starting from 0) is considered active.

        Constraints: ≥-1

        Default: 0

      • bgcolor

        @Option
public String bgcolor
        The background color of the update menu buttons.

      • bordercolor

        @Option
public String bordercolor
        The color of the border enclosing the update menu.

        Default: "#BEC8D9"

      • borderwidth

        @Option
public Integer borderwidth
        The width (in px) of the border enclosing the update menu.

        Constraints: ≥0

        Default: 1

      • buttons

        @Option
public final ControlOptions buttons
        Menu button options.

      • direction

        @Option
public UpdateMenuOptions.DirectionEnum direction
        Determines the direction in which the buttons are laid out, whether in a dropdown menu or a row/column of buttons. For LEFT and UP, the buttons will still appear in left-to-right or top-to-bottom order respectively.

        Default: DOWN

      • font

        @Option
public final FontOptions font
        The font of the update menu button text.

      • pad_b

        @Option(value="pad.b")
public Integer pad_b
        The amount of padding (in px) along the bottom of the component.

        Default: 0

      • pad_l

        @Option(value="pad.l")
public Integer pad_l
        The amount of padding (in px) along the left of the component.

        Default: 0

      • pad_r

        @Option(value="pad.r")
public Integer pad_r
        The amount of padding (in px) along the right of the component.

        Default: 0

      • pad_t

        @Option(value="pad.t")
public Integer pad_t
        The amount of padding (in px) along the top of the component.

        Default: 0

      • showactive

        @Option
public Boolean showactive
        Highlights active dropdown item or active button if true.

        Default: true

      • type

        @Option
public UpdateMenuOptions.TypeEnum type
        Determines whether the buttons are accessible via a dropdown menu or whether the buttons are stacked horizontally or vertically.

        Default: DROPDOWN

      • visible

        @Option
public Boolean visible
        Determines whether or not the update menu is visible.

      • x

        @Option
public Double x
        The x position (in normalized coordinates) of the update menu.

        Constraints: ≥-2 and ≤3

        Default: -0.05

      • xanchor

        @Option
public HorizontalAlignEnum xanchor
        The update menu's horizontal position anchor. This anchor binds the "x" position to the left, center or right of the range selector.

        Default: RIGHT

      • y

        @Option
public Double y
        The y position (in normalized coordinates) of the update menu.

        Constraints: ≥-2 and ≤3

        Default: 1

      • yanchor

        @Option
public VerticalAlignEnum yanchor
        The update menu's vertical position anchor This anchor binds the "y" position to the top, middle or bottom of the range selector.

        Default: TOP
